feed.title: MidwestWeekends - Travel in Minnesota, Wisconsin, Illinois, Iowa
feed.subtitle: ... because life's too short to stay home

entry.title: 10 great day trips from the Twin Cities
entry.content: Within an hour's drive, you can cruise Lake Minnetonka, stroll on the St. Croix or climb a historic bluff.

entry.title: 10 great day trips from Madison
entry.content: See the circus, visit Swiss towns or ride a rail trail: There's fun in every direction.

entry.title: 10 great day trips around Milwaukee
entry.content: Ride trolleys, see lighthouses, spot birds and hike past mansions.

entry.title: Following the tall ships
entry.content: Sloops and schooners still sail on Lake Michigan and Lake Superior.

entry.title: Free days in Minnesota and Michigan state parks
entry.content: On the second weekend of June, everyone is invited for a day of fishing, hiking and trail riding.

entry.title: Free time in state parks
entry.content: On the first two weekends of June, try a new park, trail or fishing hole for free.

entry.title: 10 great places to ride 'n' glide
entry.content: Traveling by both bike and boat, a river trip is twice the fun.

entry.title: Living like a millionaire
entry.content: As guests, visitors get a look into Duluth's gilded past.

entry.title: Cheap fall getaways
entry.content: Here are 20 places to enjoy autumn colors without going into the red.

entry.title: Cheap summer getaways in Michigan
entry.content: On the Upper Peninsula and Lake Michigan shores, vacation for as little as $100.

entry.title: Cheap summer getaways in Wisconsin
entry.content: No money, no problem: Here are 20 great vacations that are easy on the wallet.

entry.title: Cheap summer getaways in Minnesota
entry.content: No money, no problem: Here are 20 great vacations that are easy on the wallet.
